chat.greeting: Hello! I'm here to help with your application. Could you please upload your CV?
chat.cvRequest: I'll need to review your CV first. Please upload it using the button below.
chat.processing: Great! Let me process your CV...
chat.analysisComplete: Perfect! I can see you have extensive experience in digital marketing. Let me ask you a few questions to better understand your background.
chat.question1: I notice you've worked with various marketing platforms. Which ones do you feel most confident using?
chat.response1: I'm most experienced with Google Ads, Facebook Business Manager, and HubSpot. I've managed campaigns with budgets exceeding $500K annually.
chat.question2: Excellent! Can you tell me about a challenging campaign you've managed recently?
chat.response2: Last quarter, I led a multi-channel campaign for a product launch that achieved 300% ROI within 3 months, managing a team of 5 specialists.
chat.question3: That's impressive! Based on your experience, you seem like a strong fit for our Senior Marketing Manager position. How soon could you start?
chat.response3: I could start within 2 weeks after accepting an offer. I'm very excited about this opportunity!
